author: Navigating Cancer
title: Navigating Cancer Releases Care Management Solution, Naviga
text:
SEATTLE , Sept.   Navigating Cancer, the leading patient care and engagement solution for cancer programs, is pleased to announce the release of the company's care management technology, Navigating Care Connect™ (patent pending). "We built Navigating Care Connect™ to give cancer care providers a user-friendly software solution to readily identify, and proactively care for, patients who show a higher risk of complications," said Michael Graff , Navigating Cancer's VP of Product and Operations and Co-Founder. "The purpose is to enable faster patient interventions through a new model of enhanced care."  
Navigating Care Connect TM helps patients adhere to their cancer treatment regimens and offers them a simple-to-use way to report their symptoms and side effects in real time. For providers, it facilitates same-day alerts based on patient-reported data, indicating when a patient should be watched more carefully or contacted immediately. 
Navigating Care Connect TM will support practices in implementing a variety of new payment models, such as CMMI's upcoming Oncology Care Model. It currently supports Chronic Care Management, with features ranging from the automated identification of eligible patients all the way through to customized time tracking and CPT Code 99490 billing reports.
"We have seen many payer pilot programs in oncology over the past few years consistently demonstrate that care management reduces costs and improves care," said Gena Cook , Navigating Cancer's CEO. "For cancer programs to be able to provide care management at scale, the right technology will be key. We designed this care management solution to meet new payment reform models while at the same time enabling patients to participate and feel more cared for."
Navigating Care Connect ™ can function as a standalone application or as an add-on module to other Navigating Cancer products. All Navigating Cancer products are designed to integrate and interoperate with any EHR vendor.
About Navigating Cancer : Navigating Cancer is the leading patient care and engagement solution for cancer programs. For patients, Navigating Cancer provides a single, comprehensive hub that operates with any electronic health record vendor. This allows patients to stay informed and engaged seamlessly in their own care across multiple clinics, caregivers and geographies. For providers, Navigating Cancer offers an agile means of satisfying current requirements for Meaningful Use, Commission on Cancer and new payment reform models. For more information, visit: https://www.navigatingcancer.com
